content.user_title: Automate Project Setup for Claude Code
content.value_statement: Setting up new projects with proper workflow files is time-consuming. This skill automates the creation of CLAUDE.md, AGENTS.md, and Plans.md with project-specific configurations.
actual_capabilities: Generates CLAUDE.md, AGENTS.md, and Plans.md workflow files
Creates secure Claude Code settings with proper permissions
Provides adaptive setup based on project analysis
Scaffolds new project structures with technology-specific templates
Asks users to clarify ambiguous project states
Merges settings non-destructively with existing configurations
limitations: Requires external template files not included in this directory
Depends on scripts/analyze-project.sh for project analysis
Needs separate template directory for workflow file generation
Japanese language documentation may limit accessibility

best_practices: Always review generated settings.json before committing to ensure permissions align with your security requirements
Use the adaptive-setup skill to automatically detect your project type and apply appropriate templates
Create a .claude/settings.local.json file for personal preferences that shouldn't be shared
anti_patterns: Don't manually edit workflow files after generation - use the skill to regenerate them consistently
Avoid committing sensitive information like API keys even with deny permissions in place
Don't skip the project type confirmation when the skill detects ambiguity

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with all Claude Code versions?
faq.answer: Yes, it generates standard Claude Code configuration files that work with all recent versions.

faq.question: What happens if I already have a settings.json file?
faq.answer: The skill will merge your existing settings non-destructively, preserving your current configurations while adding new permissions.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with my CI/CD pipeline?
faq.answer: Yes, the generated workflow files are text-based and can be version controlled and deployed through your normal CI/CD process.

faq.question: How does the skill protect my sensitive data?
faq.answer: It includes deny permissions for .env files, credentials, passwords, and secrets by default in the generated settings.

faq.question: What if the skill can't determine my project type?
faq.answer: It will ask you to clarify whether it's a new or existing project before proceeding with setup.

faq.question: Can I customize the generated templates?
faq.answer: The skill uses templates from the templates/ directory. You can modify these templates to match your team's standards.
